title: It could have been far better
review: 'It' is far less scary than the first original movie. Tim Curry putted his character on another dimension by playing more psychological. Moreover, the abondance of hemoglobine scenes acted a little bit as a turned down.They wanted this movie closer of the Stephen King's book atmosphere but it happened to be all the contrary that occured.However, I liked the prestation of the 'new clown' who could have been epic with a better scenario.
